item.title: Sign-in Form Best Practices
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sign-in Form Best Practices Use meaningful HTML elements: <form>, <input>, <label>, and <button>. Label each input with a <label>. Use element attributes to access built-in browser features: type, name, autocomplete, required.
